title: Relationship Between Monocyte-to-High-Density Lipoprotein Cholesterol Ratio and Visceral Obesity in Patients with Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus: A Cross-Sectional Study.
abstract: The study aimed to explore the relationship between the monocyte-to-high-density lipoprotein cholesterol ratio (MHR) and visceral fat area (VFA) in patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus (T2DM). A total of 2156 patients with T2DM who received medical treatment at Zhejiang Provincial People's Hospital participated in this study.
